Method Detail

stringToMap

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Process a string which contains parameters and values in the standard URL format, i.e. param=value¶m2=value2. It returns a String to String map of the names and values.The values are URL decoded with \'x-www-form-urlencoded\'",
               params=@IPSJexlParam(name="paramstring",type="String",description="parameter string, if null then an empty map is returned"))
public Map<String,String> stringToMap(String paramstring)
                               throws UnsupportedEncodingException
Convenience method, call stringToMap(String, "x-www-form-urlencoded")

Throws:
UnsupportedEncodingException

stringToMap

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Process a string which contains parameters and values in the standard URL format, i.e. param=value¶m2=value2. It returns a String to String map of the names and values.",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="paramstring",type="String",description="parameter string, if null then an empty map is returned"),@IPSJexlParam(name="enc",type="String",description="encoding string")})
public Map<String,String> stringToMap(String paramstring,
                                                                                                                                     String enc)
                               throws UnsupportedEncodingException
Process a string which contains parameters and values in the standard URL format, i.e. param=value¶m2=value2. It returns a String to String map of the names and values

Parameters:
paramstring - parameter string, if null then an empty map is returned
enc - the encoding used to decode the value of the parameter, never null or empty.
Returns:
a string to string map of the names and values, never null
Throws:
UnsupportedEncodingException

extractFieldName

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Remove namespace from property name and return the Rhythmyx field name.",
               params=@IPSJexlParam(name="jsr170name",description="property name"))
public String extractFieldName(String jsr170name)
Remove namespace from property name and return the Rhythmyx field name.

Parameters:
jsr170name - property name, never null
Returns:
the processed property name, never null

equalNumbers

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Compare two things that should be numbers but may be represented by strings or by numbers.",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="a",description="a string with a numeric value or a number"),@IPSJexlParam(name="b",description="a string with a numeric value or a number")})
public boolean equalNumbers(Object a,
                                                                                                                   Object b)
Compare two things that should be numbers but may be represented by strings or by numbers.

Parameters:
a - a string with a numeric value or a number
b - a string with a numeric value or a number
Returns:
true if the two represent the same number

extractNumber

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Extract a numeric value from the argument, or zero if the argument is either not a Number or not a String with a numeric value",
               params=@IPSJexlParam(name="a",description="a string with a numeric value or a number"))
public long extractNumber(Object a)
Extract a numeric value from the argument, or zero if the argument is either not a Number or not a String with a numeric value

Parameters:
a - a string with a numeric value or a number
Returns:
the numeric value, or zero if not a number

stripSpaces

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Remove leading and trailing whitespace, and replace any embedded sequence of whitespace characters with a single space each.",
               params=@IPSJexlParam(name="src",description="the source string, never null or empty"))
public String stripSpaces(String src)
Remove leading and trailing whitespace, and replace any embedded sequence of whitespace characters with a single space each.

Parameters:
src - the source string, may be empty but never null
Returns:
the trimmed, compacted result string, never null
